description.text: The founding editor-in chied of AMA of JAMA Network Open will be Frederick P. Rivara, MD, MPH, now editor in-chief of JAMA Pediatrics.

Our editorial goal es to publish the very best clinical research across all disciplines, serving the workdwide community of investigators and clinicians and meeting the evolving needs and requirements of authors and funders
